description: This file defines a React functional component named ProfilePage, which provides a user interface for editing and saving a mechanic's profile information such as display name and service area. It manages local state for input fields and handles saving through a data service, including success and error messages.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Handles form submission to validate input, update the profile via dataService, and manage UI feedback.

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^      const profile = { name: name.trim(), serviceArea: serviceArea.trim() };$/

ctags.name: profile
ctags.pattern: /^      const profile = { name: name.trim(), serviceArea: serviceArea.trim() };$/

ctags.name: serviceArea
ctags.pattern: /^      const profile = { name: name.trim(), serviceArea: serviceArea.trim() };$/

fields.name: const profile = { name: name.trim(), serviceArea: serviceArea.trim() };
